title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a small bowl, stir together flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth. Beat in the vanilla and eggs until light and fluffy. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients.

title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Meanwhile, saut√© garlic in olive oil until golden, then add red pepper flakes. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with garlic and oil, toss until well coated.

title: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add eggs and stir until cooked to desired doneness.

title: Grilled Cheese
instructions: Butter one side of each slice of bread. Place one slice of bread, buttered side down, in a skillet over medium heat. Top with cheese, then remaining slice of bread, buttered side up. Cook until golden on both sides.

title: Apple Grape Salad
instructions: Chop apples and grapes into bite-sized pieces. Combine in a bowl and serve.
